name: Rise of Abaddon
description:
Collect the 4 artifacts of power in order to defeat the demon lord Abaddon. This game was created for the 2019 Global Game Jam. The theme is "What home means to you."

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Arrow Keys - Shooting

1 - Normal arrows

2 - Fire arrows

3 - Explosive arrows

4 - Poison arrows

ZXCV - Abilities

E - Interact

Tips:

Use your home! The computer lets you restock and the bed lets you level up

You probably don't want to try the desert until you've got at least one speed upgrade
